articles.title: As West opens up, Asia’s ‘zero-Covid’ economies face hermit risk - South China Morning Post
articles.description: In a world where Covid-19 becomes endemic, economies reliant on sealed borders to keep the virus at bay will have painted themselves into a corner, experts say.
